# engine
[![crates.io version][1]][2] [![build status][3]][4]
[![downloads][5]][6] [![docs.rs docs][7]][8]

Event loop.

- [Documentation][8]
- [Crates.io][2]
- [Releases][releases]

## Examples
### Basic
```rust
```

## Installation
```sh
$ cargo add engine
```

## Safety
This crate uses ``#![deny(unsafe_code)]`` to ensure everything is implemented in
100% Safe Rust.
